context.p: Starting the ICE-60W is not as simple as pressing a button. Read the following instructions so you can quickly and properly make your delicious dessert.

step.cmd: Before the fun can begin, go to the Shanks Hall break room on the 3rd floor (Room 380) to retrieve the freezer bowl from the freezer. The freezer bowl must remain in the freezer at all times unless it is in use.

substep.cmd: To ensure that the freezer bowl is frozen, shake it around. If you hear the sound of water moving, it is not frozen enough. Put the freezer bowl back in the freezer and wait until it is completely frozen. The freezer bowl will look like this:

step.cmd: Place the freezer bowl into the base of the machine. The base looks like this:
Once the freezer bowl is securely in the base, put the mixing arm into the freezer bowl with the circle side facing up.The mixing arm looks like this:
Place the easy-lock lid on the base of the appliance and have it positioned slightly towards the right. Turn it clockwise to lock. This is what the lid looks like:
Plug in the appliance. Plugging it in should cause the buttons to light up.
Select your function (Ice Cream, Gelato, Sorbet).

substep.cmd: Wait for a beeping sound. This indicates that the machine is ready.

step.cmd: Once you hear the beeping sound, select the Start/Stop button to start the appliance.
